definitions.apiEndpoint: One Nest controller method with @Get, @Post, @Patch, or @Delete decorator
definitions.entity: One file ending with .entity.ts under zephix-backend/src
definitions.migration: One .ts file under any directory path containing migrations under zephix-backend/src
definitions.frontendRoute: One <Route> element in the router entry file used by the app. Ambiguous routes are tracked separately

limitations: Frontend routes parser is conservative. It flags ambiguous routes when path is not a string literal.
Backend routes scan extracts decorator parameters only when they are string literals.
